Description: Verify new bookmarks can be created (not added).

Verify that items from the personal toolbar folder are properly
      added/deleted.

Determine whether text can be copied and pasted from text fields
      within a dialog box.

Verify that dragging a large (e.g. 5 MB) image across
      browser windows, to desktop, and into mail message
      works properly.

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on
      the form itself.

Verify that in the Glossary there includes a tutorial on how to do
        better searches
Change the History View to Group by Day|Site|None

Verify that things that aren't supposed to be added to history
        aren't (eg chorme:/// url's)
Don't ever show 302 redirects in history

Verify that when you have saved multiple username's and password's
      for a website, you are later presented with those same choices

Verify that when you have designated not to ever save a username and
      password in password manager, this information can be viewed in the
      password manager through preferences (expedia.com)
Determine whether a page with frames prints properly
Determine if CSS pages print properly
View source of plaintext, xml page, ftp listing.
Verify Modern theme works as advertised
